annotations.description: A Pimm's Cup Variation from The Varnish is LA? Hell Yeah! I've been meaning to do more low ABV sippers for you guys because it's nice to have a drink you can...
annotations.title: A Pimm's Cup Variation From The Varnish? Behold! The Rangoon

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Pimms No 1
.75oz (22.5ml) Ginger Syrup
2 Cucumber Slices
1 Blackberry
Lemon and Lime Wedge
Top Sprite
Cucumber Slice Garnish

Muddle fruits in glass
Add Pimms and Ginger Syrup and stir with ice
Top with sprite

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HZFyzPcroE0
title: The Rangoon
